name: Issac
text:
You managed to find my laboratory.
So... you wish for me to provide you a prosthetic body?

In a dark operating room, a young boy spoke in surprise.
It was impressive that a mere guild member had located this place, let alone a guild executive.

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes. In addition to us Invaders' intelligence,
tracing threads is also one of my specialties.

name: Issac
text:
I see, but you don't seem
to be in need of it like us.

The person before him did not appear to be in the process of decaying.
Nothing seemed to be missing from his body.

The technology the boy was researching made it possible to
replace the inherent parts of life with "something else."

That is, the prosthetic body technology he was co-researching with his collaborators.
After all, 'Righteousness' is only 'artificial'.

It would be understandable if one lost something due to illness or injury and sought a replacement.
But the person before him did not seem to be in such a situation.

name: Yoshito
text:
No, I am need of it. The power to spread
a place where my precious foster brother can live.

name: Yoshito
text:
In the past, I was saved by a foster brother named Moritaka.
Even though he should have long since passed from this world.

name: Yoshito
text:
That foster brother, to me, is absolute.
His unhappiness or loss of life... I can't even fathom it.

name: Yoshito
text:
That's why I wish for it.
I want to become 'his replacement' in such matters.

name: Yoshito
text:
If he, Moritaka, can survive, I will do anything.
My desire, is to be the one to face the world's irrationality in his stead.

name: Issac
text:
...I see. Indeed, then coming to me is correct,
for this is the cutting edge of human augmentation.

name: Issac
text:
But for the sake of your brother, not for
the irrationality you were born with... I sympathize with you.

The boy, who had made himself a test subject
before any of his other siblings, said with a smile.

name: Yoshito
text:
The irrationality I possessed — the disability,
was removed by that foster brother.

name: Issac
text:
I see, that's quite a devotion you've got.
If my sibling told me that, I'd be happy.

name: Issac
text:
...However, I'll have to put some precautions into consideration.
Not to you who think of yourself as 'his replacement,' but you yourself.

name: Issac
text:
It's the 'disability' you chose. You should be aware
that you haven't been able to replace him in that regard.

name: Issac
text:
But it's fine, leave it to me.
I'll lend you a hand so you can get closer to your desired outcome.

Chapter 2:
Moritaka Land's Opening Ceremony!?

Magical Snowland, where [Player] and friends
headed for a go-kart ride modeled after ice sleds.

...However, the sleds were racing past them
at an impossible speed for normal go-karts.

name: Tianzun
text:
Whoa-ho-ho-ho-ho!
This is the best, isn't it!?

name: Hastur
text:
Oh, how interesting. A moderate wind, a moderate speed.
It's not as good as mine, but it is quite good for a ground vehicle.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I can't lose on an ice sled!
I'm taking first place!

name: Hastur
text:
How dare you say such a thing
in front of this Hastur?

name: Hastur
text:
Feast your eyes on my power,
the 'Wind of the Old Ones'... Shubababah!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Eh, warp magic!?
No? It's called spatial leap, huh...

name: Jack Frost
text:
Seriously, I have to think about this every time.
What's the deal with the safety equipment here?

name: Korpokkur
text:
We're using futuristic technology to anticipate children's accidents.
After all, in an ideal amusement park, there would be no unexpected troubles.

name: Korpokkur
text:
There are no speed limits or height restrictions.
There's no irrationality either, especially when height varies so much from person to person.

name: Korpokkur
text:
There are no children here that my leaves can't reach.
As long as they're here, I'll protect them.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...So, even someone like me can serve as a mascot,
and someone considered dangerous like Hastur is accepted, huh?

name: Korpokkur
text:
By the way, this ice go-kart ride,
is a reference to something you guys did at Santa School.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...?
I don't remember doing anything this dangerous in class?

This attraction was a four-person race.
The other three were cheering on the racers from the sidelines.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master~! Do your best!
I can see your back!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hahaha, as expected of you, Snegurochka.
Hey, [Player]! Don't lose!

name: Tianzun
text:
What, what! [Player] gets all the attention!?
Why don't you cheer for me a little too~!?

The lead was between Hastur and Snegurochka.
As they approached the final stretch, where the three were cheering.

The two, who had been neck and neck,
gradually saw Hastur's sled pull ahead.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Amazing, Hastur-san!
I might lose at this rate...!

name: Jack Frost
text:
...!
Snegurochka, don't lose!

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Yes, thank you, Brother Jack!
Watch me, I'll win from here!

Perhaps due to Jack's cheering,
the gap gradually began to close. And then--

Snegurochka and Hastur's sleds crossed the finish line almost simultaneously,
with a difference so small it was impossible to tell with the naked eye.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, who came in first just now?
I was so focused, I only saw what was in front of me--

name: Hastur
text:
...You win, little girl.
To defeat this Hastur, truly, you are a fearsome one.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Really!?
Yay, yay! I'll brag to Grandpa, too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you very much!
[Player]-san, you fought well too!

options.text: You've got a good side, Hastur.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmm, hmm, Hastur, I'm happy that the bud of happiness is indeed sprouting in your heart.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, I don't know what you're talking about.
The little girl's skill was genuinely superior, that's all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, you are just like a child, [Player].
Shall I be your opponent next time?
Did you know that I'm quite formidable?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, Brother Jack!
I won thanks to you cheering me on!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Yes, yes, I saw.
Well, if I were there, I'd have been first, though, right?

name: Hastur
text:
Oh, if that wasn't quite a bold statement?
Better not make yourself look like a fool later.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Then, you two brothers can go next.
I'll watch how good you are!

name: Jack Frost
text:
If that's what you want, Snegurochka. You aren't underestimating me, are you?
I may skip classes, but my grades are excellent.

name: Tianzun
text:
What, you skip classes?
As a teacher, I can't overlook that~

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh, darn it.
Just so you know, I don't skip every day!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmm? It's fine, the next time you skip, tell me!
I'll take you somewhere fun~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehe, this is my way, you see?
It's the North Wind and the Sun strategy!
I'll make the one skipping class feel lonely!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehe, this is my way, you see?
It's the North Wind and the Sun strategy!
I'll make the one skipping class feel lonely!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you are always welcome!
In fact, feel free to cling to me and make yourself lonely without me!

name: Tianzun
text:
You all will get used to me soon, you know?
Like, 'I can't leave him anymore!'

name: Jack Frost
text:
No way, there's absolutely no chance of that happening.
...To think that there are really dangerous teachers like you, huh?

Yoshito and Hastur listened to the
two's conversation with unreadable expressions.

This was because Yoshito was on a mission,
and Hastur, though part of the Biological Disaster Countermeasures Unit,
weren't the type to actively show up for classes.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Snegurochka, you
mustn't become a bad adult like that, okay?

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, they're not bad adults?
Even though it's our first meeting, I could tell they're very good people!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Come on, let's all go for another round.
I'm definitely not losing this time!

Snegurochka, in a cheerful and delighted mood,
tried to line up for the go-kart ride again.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Wait, Snegurochka, you.
You're totally enjoying yourself, that you've forgotten what you came here for?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You didn't come to the amusement park to play,
but to scout for the 'Santa Departure Ceremony', right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
.........
Aaaaaaaaaaaaah!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I was having so much fun, I completely forgot!
Oh, geez, I'm so stupid, stupid, stupid!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Ah, it was Snegurochka's idea.
This year, it's planned to be held with our Ojibo Academy and this amusement park.

name: Korpokkur
text:
As the leader of that cooperative effort,
I'm here today, for that very reason.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Oh no, I have to
scout various places today...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Sorry, Brother,
I said all those confident and arrogant things, and now this...

name: Jack Frost
text:
Don't think so deeply about it.
You're still a kid, so what's wrong with having a blast?

name: Snegurochka
text:
...But there's only so much time until closing.
I was so confident in my time management for work.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Geez, don't make such a gloomy face.
It'd be rude to the people who played with you.

Snegurochka looked at [Player]
and the others with a startled expression.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I-I'm so sorry.
I said something that would dampen the fun atmosphere.

name: Tianzun
text:
Don't worry about it, Snegurochka.
In fact, if there's anything we can help with, just ask!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, you probably already know,
but I'm a missionary of happiness, and I love events at that!

name: Tianzun
text:
If you're ever lost,
I might be able to show you the way, even if just a little.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Uncle Tianzun...
I'm so sorry...

name: Tianzun
text:
What are you sorry for? We're already friends, aren't we?
A little help is only natural between us.

name: Tianzun
text:
If you all have free time,
lend us your hand, yeah?
To Tianzun's question, the first answer came from Hastur.

name: Hastur
text:
Very well. I spent time shaking off my pursuers,
so honestly, I don't know what I can do, but I don't mind helping.

options.text: Yes, if it's us, we can do it!
It looks fun, so let us help!

name: Snegurochka
text: Uncle Tianzun, Hastur-san, [Player]-san...!

And finally, everyone was
surprised by Yoshito's words.

name: Yoshito
text:
Um... I have a good idea to liven up
the Santa Departure Ceremony.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master, I apologize.
I really thought that was a good idea...

name: Yoshito
text:
Um... I have a good idea to liven up
the Santa Departure Ceremony.

name: Yoshito
text: How about opening 'Moritaka Land' here! We'll spread the preciousness of Moritaka to the children!

name: Korpokkur
text: No, not happening. I'm serious.

options.text: I thought it was a good idea?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Right?
As expected of Master, I'll follow you forever!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, there you are.
Yoshito-san, everyone's gathered up over there, so why don't we go back?

name: Yoshito
text:
No, it's fine.
It doesn't matter if I'm there or not.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Come on, that's not true.
Everyone's waiting for you!

Snegurochka tried to pull the crouching Yoshito,
but he wouldn't budge.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Haa... haa... Yoshito-san, you are also very strong, too.
I can't believe you didn't even budge...

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes, well, I cover part of my body
with an exoskeleton to enhance my physical abilities.

name: Snegurochka
text:
And you are doing that for Moritaka-san?
I really want to hear more about your story, Yoshito-san.

options.text: Come to think of it, I've never heard it either.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: To me, it's the most precious memory, but to everyone else, it's not a big deal.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: To me, it's the most precious memory, but to everyone else, it's not a big deal.

options.text: Is that something I can ask?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, I don't mind. To me, it's the most precious memory, but to everyone else, it probably isn't a big deal.

text:
He had lost his parents at a young age,
and had served the family that took him in.

He had spent his days enduring thankless tasks,
with no real bond of master and servant.

He thought he would live and die alone in this world,
never having a connection to anyone.

But then, Moritaka came into his life and accepted him.
It was the moment a ray of light pierced his dark world.

They shared many strange connections.
Their circumstances were similar, almost like true siblings...

It was the moment he realized he wasn't alone in this world,
the moment his world expanded and began to move.

name: Yoshito
text:
This body, this life, everything.
From that moment on, everything I've done was for Moritaka.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I understand... I understand! Because it's the same for me.
I want to repay the person who gave birth to my existence.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's why I'm wholeheartedly supporting the Santas!
I want to do anything I can!

name: Snegurochka
text:
...But I see, for that person,
Yoshito-san, you dream of Moritaka Land, right?

name: Yoshito
text:
No, that's 100% my defiled desire.
It's my ideal paradise, where my precious person can be happy...

options.text: This is getting a bit too far.
So, supporting your favorite is a different story, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
...
So that's... how it is.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's nothing, besides, 'defiled' is completely wrong.
I'm cheering for your dream, Yoshito-san!

name: Yoshito
text:
Really...? I never thought my dream, which even my comrade
Masanori found difficult, would have a sympathizer!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Of course!
Let's aim for Moritaka Land together!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
But, won't Moritaka-san be
surprised if Moritaka Land suddenly appears?

name: Yoshito
text:
He'll be surprised, I'm sure.
But he's kind, so he'll surely forgive me.

name: Yoshito
text:
When I asked him about 'Mori-katsu' before, he said it was
embarrassing and he wanted me to stop, but he wasn't displeased.

options.text: No, the conclusion is that he wants you to stop, isn't it?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yoshito-san, you seem to think of Moritaka-san
like a big brother, and you are acting spoiled.

name: Yoshito
text:
That... might be true.
Brother... Moritaka... Brother Moritaka...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, Yoshito-san, let's do our best.
I'll support you to the fullest.

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes, thank you very much.
Even though, you're busy with the departure ceremony yourself.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ahaha, that's true, but...
If I can't support someone's dream here, then it's pointless!

Snegurochka and Yoshito, full of enthusiasm, made some plans and
returned to their companions who were discussing the departure ceremony.

name: Tianzun
text:
Oh, you're back.
Come over here quickly, I've got some good ideas-

name: Yoshito
text:
Jack Frost... no, Frosty!
I, Inukawa Sousuke Yoshito, the Eight Dog Warrior of Righteousness, declares war on you!!

name: Yoshito
text:
I challenge you to a match for
the mascot character position, with Moritaka!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I, Magical Girl Snegurochka,
will take responsibility for this challenge!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Haaaaah!? What are you saying, suddenly coming back and-
And Snegurochka, why are you on his side!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's interesting, isn't it? Go along with it, Jack.
If you lose, the mascot will change starting today.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Korpokkur... What are you saying now?
What's the point of going along with a childish game like this?

name: Korpokkur
text:
What do you do at an amusement park if you don't go along with children's dreams?
Or are you going to wait until you become an adult?

name: Korpokkur
text:
If you want to see his happy face, then show him you can win.
Otherwise, a revolution might just happen at this amusement park, you know?

Jack looked at Yoshito's earnest gaze,
sighed, and scratched his head vigorously.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Wait a minute.
I'll get ready.

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you very much, I'll get ready too.
Then, I'll be seeing you later.

name: Tanetomo
text:
Hmm... a souvenir for Yasuyori-san and His Excellency,
I wonder what would be good?

name: Alp
text:
Oh, a souvenir... I'd like to buy something for everyone in the dorm,
but then they'd know we were following them...

name: Moritaka
text:
Umm... If I'm not mistaken, I've been
feeling a lot of gazes on me for a while now.

name: Tanetomo
text:
Oh, that's strange. Moritaka-san, no one would stalk you like that,
except perhaps Yoshito-san.

name: Moritaka
text:
No, it's not that. It's more like the children
walking by are staring intently at my face...

name: Yuma
text:
I, next, want a plushie. There, Frosty!
That Frosty over there, want!

name: Tanetomo
text:
A plushie, that's a good idea. ...Oh, headbands might
be cute and good for Yasuyori-san?

Children came running from the front of the
group as they moved through the sales area.

name: Child
text:
Ah, the doggie from before!
Wow, so cute, so cute!!

name: Moritaka
text:
Uhuh, I am not a dog!
...Wait, 'the doggie from before'??

name: Jack Frost
text:
Seriously, why do I have to do this...?
Hey [Player], what's up with the people around you?

options.text: I'm sorry, please bear with it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well... fine.
Honestly, I don't feel like I'm going to lose on my home turf.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, you! Why did you look at me before apologizing just now?
You're the source of all evil, aren't you!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You! Listen to me!
And don't come so close, you'll freeze!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Do you think they'll flinch at such a small threat?
If they were that weak, they'd have disappeared from the me from the past long ago!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haa... alright, Frosty will give you a big hug.
Don't complain if it's cold.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

name: Yoshito
text:
Everyone, thank you for waiting.
Moritaka, preparation complete.

name: Yoshito
text:
It is a masterpiece, in which the giant robot 'prosthetic body'
I received from the guild master, is enclosed in a Moritaka shell.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, what do you think, Frosty?
Children love big giant robots and fluffy things, don't they?

name: Yoshito
text:
In other words,
Moritaka's victory in this match is practically decided!

name: Jack Frost
text:
You! This is unfair!
And it's not like I'm going to lose to some giant thing!

options.text: Did you get permission from the actual person...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Master, Moritaka is like a national treasure.
Don't you agree that he should be treated as everyone's shared property?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, if any unruly individuals try to lay a hand on Moritaka, their fate is sealed, though.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Please allow me to remain silent about that, even for you, Master.
Some things in this world are better left unknown.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you can't say it, it must be for some terrible purpose...

options.text: I'm torn on who to cheer for~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Master, you'll surely cheer for Moritaka, won't you??

name: Jack Frost
text:
...So, what's next?
What exactly is this match about?

name: Snegurochka
text:
That would be a serious competition to
see who is more loved by children, of course!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
After all, the mascot of an amusement park
is all about character greetings, so we'll compete on that!

name: Snegurochka
text:
A wonderful experience that overflows with each encounter!
A truly delightful character greeting!

name: Snegurochka
text:
The winner is whoever greets more
children within the time limit! Simple, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I see. But then, it would be advantageous
to spend as little time as possible on each person.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Exactly, as expected of you, Brother!
That's why we'll have a special rule: 'Cute Points'!

name: Snegurochka
text:
The rule is simple!
You get points for each time you make a child say 'Cute~'!

name: Jack Frost
text:
C-Cute Points...!?
No, it's a good rule that emphasizes quality, but still...

name: Yoshito
text:
Oh? Could it be that even a mascot character
like you lacks confidence in being cute?

name: Yoshito
text:
We've got this match.
After all, our Moritaka is the embodiment of cuteness!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Huh? It's not that I lack confidence.
I'm used to being called cute, always...

options.text: Yoshito, you are really confident, huh?
You're used to hearing it... That's good!
Good luck to both of you~!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Alright, then, Korpokkur-san,
could I ask you to be Brother Jack's attendant?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Well, I guess I have no choice.
He's the face of our amusement park, so I can't have him losing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Simply put, it's an escort, isn't it?
You take pictures and provide support.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll do my own attendant duties.
I'm quite confident in my photography skills thanks to Mori-katsu.

options.text: They're like the line guides and camera people, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll do my own attendant duties.
I'm quite confident in my photography skills thanks to Mori-katsu.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really, Master, thank you...!
I'll definitely live up to your expectations...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Alright, then, Hastur-san and uncle Tianzun,
please handle the 'Cute Points' tally!

name: Tianzun
text:
Understood, leave it to me.
Aren't you glad I'm not participating?

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, very well!
It can't be helped, I suppose I'll help.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you both! Hehe, you're both so reliable!
Hastur... Brother Hastur! Yes!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, wait, Snegurochka.
Brother... Hastur...?

name: Hastur
text:
What's wrong, Jack?
If you wish to call me that, I'll allow it.

name: Jack Frost
text:
What's wrong with you? You're acting all prickly,
but you want me to call you Brother?

options.text: You tried to make me say it too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...!? N-No!
I was just trying to show that I am a superior being to you all-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, isn't it!
It doesn't matter even if you wanted me to call you Brother!
I was happy because it felt like we became friends!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ngh!? Brother... Brother!?
Wait a minute, I'm confused. Don't call me that all of a sudden, it's bad for my heart!
...More like, with respect...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, isn't it!
It doesn't matter even if you wanted me to call you Brother!
I was happy because it felt like we became friends!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-What's with you all of a sudden?
Snegurochka too, I'm not your brother!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It doesn't hurt to call you Brother!
Don't you think it's wonderful that I feel like we've become friends?

text:
As everyone was talking, Big Moritaka was quite conspicuous,
drawing the interest of the surrounding children, who began to gather.

name: Child
text:
Wow, a big doggie!
Is that Frosty's new friend?

name: Child
text:
Frosty's here too!
I thought I wouldn't be able to see him today-!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Haha, sorry to keep you waiting, everyone!
I'm happy you waited for me!

name: Yoshito
text:
It seems it's time for battle. Frosty, we won't lose.
Big Moritaka, activate- Switch on!

Here begins the Mascot Character Greeting Showdown,
a battle for supremacy-
Battle Start

name: Trickster
text:
Woof woof! Woof woof!
Squishy paw pads, so cute~!

name: Big Moritaka
text: "This humble one is not a dog!"

name: Child
text:
Such a big belly!
So fluffy, it's like a dream~!

Yoshito's Big Moritaka was very popular with the children,
perhaps they were drawn in by its novelty and impact.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, of course.
Moritaka is very popular with children. (※Delusional)

name: Tianzun
text:
Oh, the cute points from the children are racking up quickly!
You all, we might actually win!

However, Frosty and his
team did not seem flustered by the sight.

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's more formidable than I thought.
If we're not careful, we might get tripped up.

name: Jack Frost
text:
No way, you must be joking. There's no way I'd let Frosty, the character I've
spent so long to build up, lose to some random character out of nowhere.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Just you watch, you'll see how much
that hopeless guy you picked up has grown.

Saying that, Jack rushed
towards the child at the very front.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hello, would you like to take a picture together?
Oh, isn't that my phone case? I'm so happy!

name: Child
text:
You're right! Frosty, I have almost all of your merchandise!
Please sign this T-shirt!

Jack, the mascot of the amusement park,
shows his professional behavior at the happy children.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...I know. I've been watching you for a long time.
Otherwise, I would have kicked you out of our paradise long ago.

At that moment, a loud cheer erupted from
somewhere other than Frosty or Moritaka.

name: Child
text:
Wow, a sparkling prince!
So cool~!

name: Hastur
text:
Ngh!? Don't come near me, little brat!
Aren't you afraid of me!?

name: Trickster
text:
Excuse me, wonderful old man!
Will you take a picture with me?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmm? Of course I will!
Is this good enough?

Before they knew it, Hastur and Tianzun
were also surrounded by other children.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Oh dear, it seems other formidable rivals have appeared?
Haha, the children are dispersed, so it might turn into a real match!

Children rushed towards Korpokkur,
who was attending Frosty.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Eh, you want to take a picture with me?
No, I'm currently Frosty's attendant...

name: Korpokkur
text:
Ugh, don't make that face...
Alright, but don't post it on social media, alright!

And not just Korpokkur,
but also towards Yoshito-

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes, next please-
Eh? Me? M-Me?

name: Trickster
text:
Yes! I want to take a picture with you!
Is that... alright?

name: Yoshito
text:
So I didn't mishear...
No, it's not that it's not okay, but...

options.text: It's fine, go ahead and take some.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Master, if you said so. But I'm really bad at taking pictures and smiling...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Master, if you said so. But I'm really bad at taking pictures and smiling...

options.text: Yoshito, you're looking really cute right now!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Don't say 'cute' like that, Master...
You shouldn't casually say 'cute' to anyone other than Moritaka!

text:
Yielding to the child's enthusiasm,
Yoshito's hesitant eyes were captured by the camera.

name: Trickster
text:
Wow, I'm so happy!
Thank you very, very much!!

Watching the child leave with a beaming smile,
Yoshito couldn't help but smile naturally.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was it that good...?
He might regret later that he didn't take a picture with Moritaka instead of me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: But, he was happy, and... I was a little happy too, I'm embarrassed to admit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes... I was smiling, wasn't I?
I see...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Indeed, seeing that child's happy face, I was a little happy too, though I'm embarrassed to admit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's... right.
I'm somehow happy too.

name: Yoshito
text:
Frosty... I feel like I understand
his reason for being here, just a little.

The greeting competition between Frosty and Yoshito & Big Moritaka
eventually drew in their costumed companions as well.

Snegurochka watched the scene
with sparkling eyes.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I... I just had a great idea!
I might be able to use this and that for the Santa Departure Ceremony!

And so, the plaza remained lively with
children until the time limit was reached.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Well, I guess the win is mine.
I hope you've learned your lesson and won't say anything foolish again.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hold on, Brother!
Don't you say that about Yoshito-san's dream!

name: Yoshito
text:
No, I lost rightfully this time. My understanding was naive-
And Frosty and the children made me realize that.

name: Jack Frost
text:
What, aren't you surprisingly understanding.
Well, if you understand now, that's fine!

name: Yoshito
text:
You truly love little children,
and you become Frosty because you want to see their happy faces.

name: Yoshito
text:
I, who only thought of Moritaka,
could never make children happy.

Snegurochka glared at Jack, who was flustered by
the sudden praise, with a strangely angry face.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Don't you get carried away, Brother!
I won't forgive you if you make Yoshito-san cry!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Why are you so angry at me!?
I don't get it at all... This is why kids are a pain.

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you... Jack, please do not get the wrong idea.
This time, I was the one who lost to you, not Moritaka!

name: Yoshito
text:
Next time, as Moritaka's Royal Guard,
I will spread Moritaka's goodness and make humanity smile...!

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you, Snegurochka.
For giving me this opportunity, I feel like I've taken a step closer to my dream.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehehehehe, the day when a revolution occurs in this amusement park,
dyeing it entirely in Moritaka's colors is not far off...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yeah, that's good!
It seems that Yoshito-san has been refreshed!

name: Jack Frost
text:
It's not good at all!! Snegurochka, you instigated this from the start,
so it's your fault I was dragged into this troublesome situation, alright?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ow, ow, ow!
Stop poking my head! Stop it~!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother, you were able to be Frosty as usual
in front of [Player]-san and the others, weren't you?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Before, you would have definitely said no.
Hehe, isn't that a step forward?

name: Yoshito
text:
I see... I thought it was strange that you would cooperate with me,
whom you just met, but it seems I was cleverly used as a pretext.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's not it!? I just thought that the match with
Brother might be a hint for your dream, Yoshito-san!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Because, the atmosphere when Brother talks about children
and when you talk about Moritaka-san was similar, Yoshito-san.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, just kidding.
I was happy when you said you'd cheer me on.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, first that tentacle guy, and now I'm similar to this guy!?
Snegurochka, just what do I look like to you?

options.text: Now that you mention it, indeed...?
Both of you are quite negative, aren't you?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmph, speaking of which, Hastur was also quite happy when
he was surrounded by children like Frosty for a while, wasn't he?

name: Hastur
text:
Don't spout nonsense, you fool!
I was so tired from having to be vigilant so I wouldn't accidentally kill anyone!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Anyway, is it really okay to spend time on this casual chat?
Have you guys forgotten about the Santa Departure Ceremony again?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, that's right!
About that, I had a great idea--

Just as Snegurochka was about to announce the idea
she had come up with during the greeting event-

name: Moritaka
text:
Yoshito--!
What in the world is this--!?

name: Yoshito
text:
M-Moritaka!?
What are you doing here!?

name: Yoshito
text:
Ah, if Moritaka was the one to defeat me,
I would have no more regrets in this life...

name: Moritaka
text:
What nonsense are you speaking!
I won't allow you to feign asleep until I hear your explanation about that giant me!

name: Tanetomo
text:
Well, well, Moritaka-san, this sudden outburst
from Yoshito-san is nothing new, is it?

name: Masanori
text:
Hehe, Yoshito-dono, [Player]-dono,
your outfits suit you well.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow, you're the real Moritaka-san!
This is my first time meeting you, but it doesn't feel like it.

name: Moritaka
text:
Oh, my apologies for the delayed greeting. My name is Inuzuka Shino Moritaka.
This time, Yoshito has caused a great deal of trouble...

name: Snegurochka
text:
It wasn't troublesome at all!
Moritaka-san, you were very popular with the children!

name: Yoshito
text:
Moritaka, I want to make everyone, especially the children,
smile by letting them know your preciousness!

options.text: One person was challenged to a duel, though.
It's a bit too refreshing... You can get angry.

name: Moritaka
text:
Yoshito, for now, there's one thing I want to say.
...Please dispose of that giant me immediately.

name: Yoshito
text:
P-Please, anything but that...!
That Moritaka is my... treasure...!!

name: Moritaka
text: Did I not make myself clear??

name: Yoshito
text:
Ugh... Yes.
I'm sorry, Moritaka, for not understanding you completely.

name: Moritaka
text:
The real me is over here!
Over here!!

name: Moritaka
text:
Honestly... Even without creating such a thing, I'm still here, aren't I?
There's no need to keep our relationship a secret like before.

Yoshito's brain overloaded at Moritaka's
declaration of "I'm here," and he fainted.

options.text: ...He's moved on to a better place.
Moritaka, it's your fault for being so suggestive.

name: Hastur
text:
What in the world is this chaos?
What in the world are we being shown!?

name: Tianzun
text:
Wahahaha, look everyone!
Yoshito has the happiest expression on his face!

Then, later than expected, members of Ueno Academy arrived,
apparently having followed Moritaka and the others.

name: Yuma
text:
Haa... haa...
Moritaka, legs, fast.

name: Alp
text:
Ah--! Frosty's here!
He's popular, a rival, nghhh...

name: Pazuzu
text:
You suddenly started running, and then... Big Moritaka-chan!?
Little lizard, you and the others are here too.

options.text: Oh, it's Pazuzu and the others!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pazuzu
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course. Being good with appearances is this Pazuzu-san's strength!
A future oil king can't do without diplomacy.

name: Hastur
text:
Pazuzu, not only you, but Alp,
and even Yuma, what are you all doing here!?

At Hastur's suspicious gaze,
the three quickly averted their eyes, as if their mischief had been exposed.

name: Yoshito
text:
That's right, Moritaka.
I was going to hand you the ticket anyways, so what are you doing here?

name: Moritaka
text:
Whoa, he's alive again!?
And why are you pressuring me after all that trouble you caused me!?

name: Yoshito
text:
You really wanted to come with Master, didn't you?
Otherwise, you wouldn't have bothered to chase us, right??

name: Moritaka
text:
Close, close, too close!
There's a reason higher than mountains and deeper than valleys for this...

name: Tanetomo
text:
Hehe, Yoshito-san.
Moritaka-san came along because he was worried about you.

name: Yoshito
text:
M-Moritaka is worried about me...?
Hehe, hehehehehe...

name: Pazuzu
text:
Yes, we were also worried about our little lizard.
We wondered if he could adapt to meeting new people.

name: Hastur
text:
Don't act like you're my guardian, Pazuzu!
I'm not a child, so I don't need you to worry about me!

name: Korpokkur
text:
You talk big.
Even though you were innocently frolicking like a child.

name: Hastur
text:
Ngh, don't just make up things, you fool!
I wasn't having any fun at all, not one bit!

name: Pazuzu
text:
Ahaha, it seems my worries were unfounded.
I'd hate to impose, so we're going now.

name: Hastur
text:
Yes, hurry up and get out of here!
...I'm leaving the souvenirs for the dorm members to you!

name: Yuma
text: Hastur... You, with me, no?

name: Hastur
text:
Don't misunderstand, it's not that I don't want to!
You can come with me again next time, but for now-

Hastur turned back.
Behind him were his companions who had helped him shake off his pursuers.

Perhaps sensing everything from his gaze,
Pazuzu smiled gently.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Hehe, alright then, have fun, little lizard.
Shall we go, Yuma, Alp?

name: Moritaka
text:
Very well, then let us go as well.
Yoshito, if you pull anything else of this sort, I won't forgive you, alright?

name: Yoshito
text:
...I understand.
I won't do anything, so you enjoy the amusement park too.

name: Moritaka
text:
...I'm curious about that pause, but honestly,
it's a bit surprising. I thought you'd stop me no matter what.

name: Yoshito
text:
What, if you want me to stop you, please feel free to say so?
I still have things I want to do with those children.

name: Yoshito
text:
That child who cheered for my dream,
said that she wanted to make the Santa Departure Ceremony a success.

name: Yoshito
text:
Now I want to help them.
I don't know if there's anything I personally can do, but...

name: Moritaka
text:
...Yoshito.
Very well, I'll be cheering for you.

name: Yoshito
text:
But, I haven't given up on my dream either.
Someday, I'll make my dream Moritaka Land a reality.

options.text: I'll help you with that too, Yoshito.
Should we think of other methods together...?

name: Yoshito
text:
...I didn't expect you to say such things,
even after bringing me here.

Yoshito thought. Since that day, he had been alone.
He thought he had lived as a tool.

He thought that it was presumptuous to think of the future,
for his hands have been defiled.

To share his own dream with his Master like this,
was something he never imagined.

name: Yoshito
text:
Perhaps if you were my Master, I...
No, I apologize, it's nothing.

name: Moritaka
text:
...Hmm? Now, before this good story,
I heard something I can't overlook--

Yoshito had already run off towards Hastur and the others,
and Moritaka's voice faded emptily.

name: Hastur
text:
Mhm, what's wrong?
You, aren't you supposed to be with them?

name: Yoshito
text:
That's my line.
You, aren't those people from the same dorm as you?

name: Yoshito & Hastur
text:
.........
Well, it's best that we stop this conversation here.

name: Snegurochka
text:
You two, over here~!
You see, about the Santa Departure Ceremony-

And so, on a later day,
in the Santa School classroom-

name: Snegurochka
text:
After observing the amusement park, I came up with an idea!
I'm going to tell you all about it now!

The moment Snegurochka declared this from the podium,
a surprising change appeared in her appearance.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Magical Girl Snegurochka makes her appearance!
I'll cast a spell of happiness on everyone!

name: Student
text:
That's really amazing and cute, Snegurochka-chan!
But how did you do it without using the 'app'!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, that's because. For this plan, in addition to Ojibo Academy,
I've invited a special collaborator!

At that moment, dressed in costumes,
people suddenly appeared, as if they were teleported into the area.

name: Hastur
text:
Honestly... to use my power for such a trivial thing,
Snegurochka, you really have some nerve.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you, Brother Hastur!
But, you are the only one I could ask for this.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, well...!
It can't be helped, I suppose I'll cooperate.

name: Hastur
text:
There are only few Old Ones more excellent than me
in intergalactic travel, so you better be grateful!

options.text: You could've used it to shake off your pursuers.
It seems like something you'd think of first.

name: Hastur
text:
S-Silence! I didn't even think of the
idea of shaking them off in the first place...

name: Yoshito
text:
Be careful, Master, for this is undoubtedly a tactic to
draw your attention with feigned incompetence.

name: Korpokkur
text:
What? So you're saying we were forced to go along
because you wanted to be alone with [Player]?

name: Hastur
text:
I said that was not it!
You loudmouths... shall I rot and disable your tongues!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
A-Anyway, everyone here is a collaborator
for the Santa Departure Ceremony!

The Santa School students began to murmur
at the sudden intruders, all dressed in strange costumes.

name: Snegurochka
text:
We Santas go to the children, and the amusement park
welcomes the children and delivers dreams--

name: Snegurochka
text:
If people and places like that come together,
I think it could be a Christmas like never before.

name: Snegurochka
text:
For example, the wish to 'meet a transforming hero' can,
of course, be granted by Santa.

name: Snegurochka
text:
However, if they could meet them at a place like an amusement park,
I think they would be even happier.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Children want to meet Santas, of course, but also princes,
evil charismatic figures, magical girls... there are many others.

name: Snegurochka
text:
So, as a thank you to the children of Ojibo Academy who are helping to liven up the departure
ceremony, why don't you all become the admired figures they wish to see?

name: Student
text:
Wow, I'm gonna be a hero!
The hero that children admire!

name: Student
text:
I want to be a fluffy character
and have children tell me I'm cute~!

The Santa School classroom became lively,
but one seat in the back remained conspicuously empty.

options.text: By the way, isn't Tianzun missing too?

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's okay, I'm sure.
I believe in Brother Jack.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But why isn't Uncle Tianzun here!?
He was supposed to announce the fun things we're doing at the amusement park!

options.text: Well, he's a teacher, so surely--
He seems to like wandering around.

name: Tianzun
text:
...Jack, is it okay for you
to be slacking off here? Hmmmm?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Leave me alone. You, if you wander around school in
that outfit alone, you'll cause quite a stir, just so you know?
